Package mavlc.syntax

Interface HasType

All Known Implementing Classes:
Addition, And, BinaryExpression, BoolTypeSpecifier, BoolValue, CallExpression, Compare, Declaration, Division, DotProduct, ElementSelect, Exponentiation, Expression, FloatTypeSpecifier, FloatValue, FormalParameter, IdentifierReference, IntTypeSpecifier, IntValue, IteratorDeclaration, MatrixCols, MatrixMultiplication, MatrixRows, MatrixTranspose, MatrixTypeSpecifier, Multiplication, Not, Or, RecordElementDeclaration, RecordElementSelect, RecordInit, RecordTypeSpecifier, SelectExpression, StringTypeSpecifier, StringValue, StructureInit, SubMatrix, Subtraction, SubVector, TypeSpecifier, UnaryExpression, UnaryMinus, ValueDefinition, VariableDeclaration, VectorDimension, VectorTypeSpecifier, VoidTypeSpecifier
public interface HasType
Superinterface for everything with an associated type.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Type
    getType()
    Returns the type currently associated with this node.
    boolean
    isTypeSet()
    Reports whether a type is currently available on this node.
    void
    setType(Type type)
    Sets the type of this node.

  • Method Details

    • isTypeSet

      boolean isTypeSet()
      Reports whether a type is currently available on this node.

    • getType

      Type getType()
      Returns the type currently associated with this node.
      Returns:
      The type associated with this node. This method never returns null.
      Throws:
      InternalCompilerError - If this method is called in a state where isTypeSet() returned false.

    • setType

      void setType(Type type)
      Sets the type of this node.
      Parameters:
      type - the type to set. Some nodes, such as literal values or simple type specifiers, may restrict the types supported.
